introduction.introduction: A dedicated and accomplished professional with a background in computing, I am thrilled to apply for the Lecturer position at the Computing School of Riphah International University Lahore Campus. With my expertise in the relevant domain of computing and extensive experience in teaching at the university level, I am confident in my ability to contribute to the success of the school and its students. I possess excellent communication and presentation skills, which have allowed me to effectively engage students and facilitate their learning. I am skilled in collaborating with colleagues, contributing to the development of curriculum and educational materials. I am excited about the opportunity to join the esteemed faculty at Riphah International University and make a positive impact on the education of future computing professionals.

technical_skills: Experience in teaching at the university level
Expertise in the relevant domain of computing
Ability to work collaboratively in a team
Proficiency in relevant software and tools
